processing.sourceData: Record type, e.g. Seabed Image or Per Beam Intensity for Kongsberg
processing.staticOffset: Static Offset per system in dB (if enabled). Default is None
processing.clipRawBackscatter: Min and Max accepted values for raw backscatter (if enabled). Default is None
processing.AVG_mode: AVG mode (if enabled), e.g. Interpolated, File Based, or Project Based
processing.AVG_patchPingcount: AVG patch ping count (if enabled), e.g. Auto, One Per File, etc.
